page.title: 12FARMING
page.content:
The following farms are in our area:
{Howard's Farm, Poplar Farm, Brookhouse {Farm, Clay Lane Farm, Parkside Farm, {Burrows Lane Farm}and{Roughleys Brow {Farm. {} All of this farmland originally belonged to the{Earl of Derby. {} Only{Howard's Farm, Poplar Farm}and{ {Roughleys Brow Farm}are still working farms. They are mostly arable farms growing barley, potatoes, cabbages, carrots and sprouts. {Howard's Farm}and{Roughleys Brow {Farm}also have sheep and cattle. The other remaining farms now merely stable and graze other peoples horses as well keeping a few chickens. {Parkside Farm}sells manure.
